mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT TB_Area.id, TB_Area.name FROM TB_Know INNER JOIN TB_KnowArea ON TB_Know.id = TB_KnowArea.knowid AND TB_Know.subjectid = #{subject_id} INNER JOIN TB_Area ON TB_Area.id = TB_KnowArea.areaid

SELECT DISTINCT qb_standard.* FROM TB_Know INNER JOIN TB_KnowStandard ON TB_Know.id = TB_KnowStandard.knowid AND TB_Know.subjectid = #{subject_id} INNER JOIN qb_standard ON qb_standard.id = TB_KnowStandard.standard
SELECT qb_question_type.* FROM qb_subject_questionType INNER JOIN qb_question_type ON qb_subject_questionType.subject = #{subject_id} AND qb_subject_questionType.type = qb_question_type.type
